div.p:
ARMY AIR BASE
HUNTER FIELD
SAVANNAH, GEORGIA

Returned from furlough
Aug 17. + found things in such a
mess that I have hardly had
time to think. Have worked about
night and day but can now see
over the tops at least. But I
guess it hasn't all been for
nothing, I understand I am
to get a Staff Sgt's. rating soon.
I didn't forget your birthday but
I am broke + won't get paid
until the tenth. What would
you like to have?

How is G.W. + the kids?
I was disappointed for I

ARMY AIR BASE
HUNTER FIELD
SAVANNAH, GEORGIA

thought sure there would be
some pictures here for me when
I got back. I sure would like
to see the boys. They will be
so big when I do get to see
them for I am now in this
thing for the duration + 6 mos.
I moved Grandma over in the
cabins while I was home. I
went out to the plant + saw
the kids. It didn't seem like
the same place. So many new
face. I also went to
Murphysboro. Mrs. Stella +
Louis asked about all of you.

ARMY AIR BASE
HUNTER FIELD
SAVANNAH, GEORGIA

Why don't you drop Grandma
a few lines? I saw Mr. Carlstead
Ida + C.J. but didn't see Mrs.
Carlstead.

I am so sleepy I can't see
so guess I better say good night
for this time.

Sgt Ann Smith
700158
62nd WAC Post Hq Co.
Hunter Field, Ga.

Mrs. G. W. Carlstead
431 Alleghany
Chabot Terrace
Vallejo Calif.
